resource.chars:
10, Moreton Gardens 
Old Brompton Road, S.W.
October 25 1908
Dear Sir Archibald 
I got your letter 
enclosing Captain Scott’s protest 
at the Office yesterday morning.
It is very painful reading; as the 
remuneration for some conscientious 
and arduous labour it is not 
very generous.
I have spent - I think 
I may say wasted - a good
 deal of time on writing
